name: Trulion Online
description:
Trulion Online is a top down 2D Online Adventure RPG being developed for PC, Android, and iOS. The continent of Yartoria is in a crisis as the three major world powers struggle for influence over this once peaceful land. 

PC Version:

Extract files to the location of your choosing. Open the TrulionOnline.exe select the visual setting of your choice. Click play and register for a new account, be sure to verify your email or you will not be able to login. Login and enjoy.

Android Version:

Allow Unknown Sources and install the apk file. Open the TrulionOnline app and register for a new account, be sure to verify your email or you will not be able to login. Login and enjoy.

iOS Version: 

To register to play on iOS Devices you will need to sign up at the following link https://testflight.apple.com/join/Ip5nh1vc (If you are already on iOS you don't have to do this)
